title: Railworks TS2015  Virtual Railroads DB BR140 EL Orientrot
description:
DB BR140 Orientrot ExpertLine

The package for electrical Einheitslok BR140 contains six locomotives 
of the box Einheitslok in orient red color. The DB BR140 is designed specifically for freight service and has compared the BR110 a lower power and a different gear ratio.



The locomotives in the package differ in equipment variations such as 
lights, running boards, ventilation grille, lettering and numbers.

As is usual for vehicles from the range Expertline waiting the BR140 
on with many features and requires the player a lot more 
than other vehicles in the simulation.

The contained mobile models of DB BR140 distinguished by 
comprehensive functions of and are not for beginners suitable in TS 
and not be moved without first an intensive look at the manual 
to have thrown !!

Important!  Make sure you use please the possibility for the manual vehicle 
download before you buy, so you get an overview of requirements and 
can provide functions of the locomotive.

Prototypical drivability
Stage circuit with follow 
high-voltage switching device W29t with corresponding sound

model near soundscape optimized EFX
